properties.question: Under which age group is hospitalisation without consent typically allowed for agitation and acute delirium, assuming all other conditions are met and the patient is unable to provide consent?
properties.option_b: Patients aged 18-21 who are legally emancipated
properties.option_c: Patients aged under 18 without parental consent
properties.option_d: Patients aged 65 and above with a living will
